item1:
库存产品基本数据的查询
Query article basic data
item2:
可查询所有货物基本数据
Can query all article basic data
item4:
SAP下传相关货物基本数据
SAP downloads basic data of related articles
item5:
Article No, GTIN No
Article No, GTIN No
输出
item6:
库存产品基本数据
article basic data
异常处里
item7:
如果无符合条件的库存产品数据，系统将提示查无库存产品信息；
如果因为网路中断产生的异常，须结束WES软件，请网路管理人员恢复网路后再重启WES
If the WES software needs to be terminated due to an abnormality caused by a network interruption, ask the network administrator to restore the network and restart WES
操作步骤
item8:
1. 输入查询条件或挑选Article No后点选Query查询库存产品基本数据
Enter query conditions or select Article No and click Query to query basic data of inventory products
2. 点选功能菜单Refresh可清除画面上的数据回到初始状态
Click refresh to clear the data on the screen and return to the initial state
3. 点选功能菜单Exit或关闭视窗可结束此作业
Click the function menu exit or close window to end this job
后置条件
